properties.areaDesc: James River from James River Bridge to Hampton Roads Bridge-Tunnel
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 24 at 7:02AM EST until January 25 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...East then southeast winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25
kt this evening into early Saturday morning, then south around
15 kt until late Saturday morning. Waves 2 to 3 ft expected.

* WHERE...James River from James River Bridge to Hampton Roads
Bridge-Tunnel.

* WHEN...From 10 PM Friday to 10 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY
